titleStmt.title: SII 14.244: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 244. (A.R. No. 532 of 1911.) ŚĒRMĀDĒVI, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE FIRST prākāra IN THE BHAKTAVATSALA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of the 19+1st year has to be attributed to Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha though there are no specific indications of this identity. It registers gifts of money by a certain Āṭkoṇḍavilli, Attiyūrāḻvāṉ and Uyyakkoṇḍāṉ of Attiyūr for burning lamps in the temple of Śrībhaktapriyattu-niṉṟaruḷiya-Paramasvāmin at Śēravaṉmādēvi-chaturvēdimaṅgalam a brahmadēya in Muḷḷi-nāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tribhuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 10 9Āvatu Etirā māṇṭu muḷḷiṉāṭ
ṭu braramateyamRead brahmadeyam.ceravaṉmātevic caruppetimaṅkalattu śrīpattappiriyattu ninṟaruḷiṉa paramasvāmikaḻukku
kucoviāḷkkoṇṭavilli tirununtāviḷakkukku Oṭukkiṉa Accu 5- Añcum koṇṭu cāvāmuvā perāṭu Aim
patum koṇṭu Ittirunantāviḷakkuc cantirātittavaṟ Ivvemperumāṉ kaṉmikaḷ celuttakkaṭavarāka cipaṇṭārattu Accu
oṭukkiṉeṉ Āṭkkoṇṭavilliyeṉ .—ipparicu Ivvemperumāṉ kaṉmikaḷ celut takkaṭavarāka A
ttiyūrṟāḻvāṉ vaicca tirunantāviḷakku Uṭalāka Oṭukkina Accu nālaraiy . Ipparicukku sandhyādīpam Oṉṟukku
tiyūr Uyyakkoṇṭāṉ Oṭukkiṉa Accu ṉṟu . Ipparicu sandhyādīpam Oṉṟu celakkaṭavitāka kurovi śrī kṛṣṇaThe inscription is built in after this.
Digital edition of SII 14.244 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
